price: Kandi ntiyigeze agira itsinda ry’abantu bamutabara (ngo bamurinde) ibihano bya Allah, ndetse na we ubwe ntiyashoboye kwitabara.
arabic: وَلَمۡ تَكُن لَّهُۥ فِئَةٞ يَنصُرُونَهُۥ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا كَانَ مُنتَصِرًا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walam takun lahu fi-atun yanṣurūnahu min dūni al-lahi wamā kāna muntaṣiran
